mapper.select:
select

select from game where license_id = #{licenseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.* from game t inner join (select max(id) as id from game where state ='4' and issue is not null and bonus_number is not null ) as g on t.id=g.id
select from game where license_id = #{licenseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and issue = #{issue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = 4

select
from game where license_id = #{licenseId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and year(stop_time) = year(now()) and stop_time > now() order by issue
